original: @166a * // thugs rje chen po bum pa bzang po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @166a * // thugs rje chen po bum pa bzang po can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Great Compassionate One, the bearer of the excellent vase.

original: gter chen bum pa gser gyi mchog / dpag bsam shing ltar 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: gter chen bum pa gser gyi mchog / dpag bsam shing ltar 'gro ba yi //
translated: The great treasure vase, supreme gold,

original: re bzhin yal ga bzad dgyed pa //
analyzed: re bzhin yal ga bzad dgyed pa //
translated: like the wish-fulfilling tree,üîΩwith branches extending to all beings,

original: de yi dbus bzhugs nyid dpal 'dud //üîΩgang yang sgrub po blo gros che //
analyzed: de yi dbus bzhugs nyid dpal 'dud // gang yang sgrub po blo gros che //
translated: I bow to the glorious one dwelling in its center.üîΩEven if the practitioner has great intelligence,

original: dad dang ldan yang dbul gyur pa //
analyzed: dad dang ldan yang dbul gyur pa //
translated: if they are poor,üîΩthey will not attain the wealth

original: de dag gis ni 'byor pa dang // dngos grub lhan cig 'phags pa bsgrub //
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'byor pa dang // dngos grub lhan cig 'phags pa bsgrub //
translated: and accomplishments of the noble ones.

original: re zhig phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas sam bum pa bzang po lta bu'i dbyibs kyi gzhir de dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang bu bcos la /
analyzed: re zhig phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas sam bum pa bzang po lta bu'i dbyibs kyi gzhir de dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang bu bcos la /
translated: First, in a place of abundance or in the shape of an excellent vase, one should construct a meditation hut similar to that.

original: gang du 'jug pa'i mal du mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i bum pa bris te /
analyzed: gang du 'jug pa'i mal du mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i bum pa bris te /
translated: In the bed where one enters, one should draw a vase with perfect characteristics.

original: rab tu gnas pa'i bkra shis gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa'i bkra shis gsol bar bya'o //
translated: One should make auspicious prayers for the consecration.

original: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyan gsan phab la /
analyzed: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyan gsan phab la /
translated: Then, when the moon is full, one should invite Avalokite≈õvara.

original: zla ba gcig gi bar tshangs par spyod pas btsun pa dka' thub chen po can mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig gi bar tshangs par spyod pas btsun pa dka' thub chen po can mnyes par bya'o //
translated: For one month, with pure conduct, please the noble one, the one of great austerities.

original: slad kyis yang zla ba rgyas pa'i nyin mor gyur pa na /
analyzed: slad kyis yang zla ba rgyas pa'i nyin mor gyur pa na /
translated: Later, on the full moon day,

original: gos bzang po gyon /
analyzed: gos bzang po gyon /
translated: wear good clothes,

original: skra dang kha spu ni bcos /
analyzed: skra dang kha spu ni bcos /
translated: comb your hair and beard,

original: rgyan du mas ni brgyan /
analyzed: rgyan du mas ni brgyan /
translated: adorn yourself with many ornaments,

original: rol mo mang po ni dkrol te /
analyzed: rol mo mang po ni dkrol te /
translated: play many musical instruments,

original: @166b 'phags pa'i rten la phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa bya zhing /
analyzed: @166b 'phags pa'i rten la phyag dang bskor ba la sogs pa bya zhing /
translated: and make prostrations, circumambulations, and so forth to the noble one.

original: snying gar hr'i: bsams nas de'i 'od kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bum pa la bstim mo //
analyzed: snying gar hr'i: bsams nas de'i 'od kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bum pa la bstim mo //
translated: Visualize hri·∏• in the heart, and by its light, noble Avalokite≈õvara dissolves into the vase.

original: gzhal med khang mchog rin chen bum pa bzang 'khyil la //
analyzed: gzhal med khang mchog rin chen bum pa bzang 'khyil la //
translated: In the excellent celestial palace, the excellent jeweled vase,

original: lha rdzas mgul bcings yid bzhin yal ga 'bras bus brgyan //
analyzed: lha rdzas mgul bcings yid bzhin yal ga 'bras bus brgyan //
translated: adorned with the wish-fulfilling branch and fruit,

original: de dbus sdong bu me tog au dum b'a ra'i rtser //
analyzed: de dbus sdong bu me tog au dum b'a ra'i rtser //
translated: in its center, on the top of the u·∏çumbara flower stalk,

original: 'jig rten gsum skyob dmar mdzes nor gyi rgyun can bsgom //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum skyob dmar mdzes nor gyi rgyun can bsgom //
translated: meditate on the beautiful red one, the savior of the three worlds, the one with a stream of wealth.

original: dpag med lo 'dab me tog tshogs 'khrungs padma'i yang //
analyzed: dpag med lo 'dab me tog tshogs 'khrungs padma'i yang //
translated: From the lotus, with immeasurable leaves and flowers,

original: ge sar rtse la rgyal sras chos mang ston pa dang // rtse dga' mchod pa'i lha tshogs rnam par 'phro ba yis //
analyzed: ge sar rtse la rgyal sras chos mang ston pa dang // rtse dga' mchod pa'i lha tshogs rnam par 'phro ba yis //
translated: and the hosts of gods who delight in the peak emanate.

original: sa 'dir ma lus cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul //
analyzed: sa 'dir ma lus cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul //
translated: Here on this ground, they emanate magical displays all at once.

original: mig gi rdzi bskyod rkang pa ya gcig bteg pa dang / lag pa dkur brten 'dzum pa'i mdangs legs 'gying ba sogs //
analyzed: mig gi rdzi bskyod rkang pa ya gcig bteg pa dang / lag pa dkur brten 'dzum pa'i mdangs legs 'gying ba sogs //
translated: Winking with their eyes, raising one foot, resting their hands on their hips, smiling, and so forth,

original: mi yi bu mo bzhin bzangs rnams kyang bka' bsgo la //
analyzed: mi yi bu mo bzhin bzangs rnams kyang bka' bsgo la //
translated: even the beautiful human girls give their commands.

original: bu bzangs mdun byas 'phags pa mchod la brtson par bya //
analyzed: bu bzangs mdun byas 'phags pa mchod la brtson par bya //
translated: The good sons, with the noble ones in front, strive to make offerings.

original: srung skud dri ldan lag tu thogs //
analyzed: srung skud dri ldan lag tu thogs //
translated: Holding a fragrant protection cord in the hand,

original: me tog phreng bas mgo bcings la //
analyzed: me tog phreng bas mgo bcings la //
translated: the head bound with a flower garland,

original: rnal 'byor ldan pas sngags bzla zhing //
